psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 85,9a]]I will hear what God proclaims;
[[Ps 85,9b]]the LORD –for he proclaims peace to his people.
[[Ps 85,10]]Near indeed is his salvation to those who fear him, 
glory dwelling in our land.

[[Ps 85,11]]Kindness and truth shall meet; 
justice and peace shall kiss.
[[Ps 85,12]]Truth shall spring out of the earth, 
and justice shall look down from heaven.

[[Ps 85,13]]The LORD himself will give his benefits; 
our land shall yield its increase.
[[Ps 85,14]]Justice shall walk before him, 
and salvation, along the way of his steps.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 12,35]]Jesus said to his disciples: “Gird your loins and light your lamps
[[Lc 12,36]]and be like servants who await their master's return from a wedding, ready to open immediately when he comes and knocks.
[[Lc 12,37]]Blessed are those servants whom the master finds vigilant on his arrival. Amen, I say to you, he will gird himself, have them recline at table, and proceed to wait on them.
[[Lc 12,38]]And should he come in the second or third watch and find them prepared in this way, blessed are those servants."

first_reading.title: Letter to the Ephesians
first_reading.text:
[[Ep 2,12]]Brothers and sisters: You were at that time without Christ, alienated from the community of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise, without hope and without God in the world.
[[Ep 2,13]]But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far off have become near by the blood of Christ.
[[Ep 2,14]]For he is our peace, he who made both one and broke down the dividing wall of enmity, through his flesh,
[[Ep 2,15]]abolishing the law with its commandments and legal claims, that he might create in himself one new person in place of the two, thus establishing peace,
[[Ep 2,16]]and might reconcile both with God, in one body, through the cross, putting that enmity to death by it.
[[Ep 2,17]]He came and preached peace to you who were far off and peace to those who were near,
[[Ep 2,18]]for through him we both have access in one Spirit to the Father.
[[Ep 2,19]]So then you are no longer strangers and sojourners, but you are fellow citizens with the holy ones and members of the household of God,
[[Ep 2,20]]built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, with Christ Jesus himself as the capstone.
[[Ep 2,21]]Through him the whole structure is held together and grows into a temple sacred in the Lord;
[[Ep 2,22]]in him you also are being built together into a dwelling place of God in the Spirit.
